description: The 2026 DeMarini The Goods Drop 10 USSSA Baseball Bat is engineered for optimal performance with its balanced swing feel, making it an excellent choice for both contact and power hitters. Featuring a two-piece hybrid design, this bat combines an X14 Alloy Barrel with a Paraflex Plus Composite Handle to deliver a massive sweet spot and superior feel. The Direct Connection technology ensures a stiff yet comfortable feel for enhanced responsiveness, while the Tracer End Cap boosts bat speed for maximum barrel performance. Certified with USSSA 1.15 BPF and sporting a striking teal, red, and black colorway, this bat is designed to elevate your game with every swing.
